messages.subject: Fwd: Re: Got Rid of the Math Books!
messages.msgSnippet: ... faithful Calvert user and has gone so far to say that unschoolers (without using the term unschooler) give homeschooling a bad name) and other hsers from
messages.messageBody:
>At 01:20 AM 10/12/99 -0400, you wrote:
>Erin,
>
>Your post was most comforting to my heart. And yes,
>>do you all ever get the
>>impression that so many people think those unschoolers are doing a bad job?
>
>I've met the great disapproval of both family members (my SIL is a
faithful Calvert user and has gone so far to say that unschoolers (without
using the term unschooler) give homeschooling a bad name) and other hsers
from other support groups. Such a shame, it seems to drive division
between hsers that should not be. The disapproval is very strong in our
area between the school at home and the unschooling or even relaxed hsing
crowd. Of course, I've never known people here in Ohio to be shy about
what they think is right and wrong - myself included when I'm being honest
about it. :o)
>
>
In His Service,

Laraine
praxis@...
